visualStyle.artDirection: Cute anthropomorphized objects with glassmorphic/neomorphic elements
visualStyle.rendering: High-quality 3D rendering with soft shadows and highlights

characterDesign.eyes: Large expressive cartoon eyes (typically 2D on 3D form)
characterDesign.body: Stackable modular components (base platform + character object)

sections.pattern: Subtle dot grid on dark background

characterColors.base: White, light gray, or metallic surfaces
characterColors.platforms: Dark glossy materials (black, navy, deep red)
characterColors.accents: Small pops matching section accent colors

headings.family: Bold sans-serif (Helvetica Neue Bold, SF Pro Display Bold, or similar)

hero.composition: Centered title with floating 3D character cards

navigation.style: Clean text links with minimal styling

footer.layout: Multi-column with logo, links, newsletter, social icons

structure.title: Bold heading below image
structure.background: Solid color matching character accent or gradient

styling.shadow: Medium elevation shadow on dark backgrounds

icons.background: Rounded square containers with gradient or solid color

characterPlatforms.styling: Dark with brand text/logo etched or printed
characterPlatforms.proportion: Roughly 1:1 or 2:3 character to platform ratio
characterPlatforms.material: Appears plastic or resin-like with sheen

transitions.easing: ease-in-out or cubic-bezier for smooth feel

animations.onLoad: Subtle fade-in or float-up for cards

designPrinciples.depth: Layered composition with shadows and 3D elements
designPrinciples.personality: Each character has unique expression and pose

performance.optimization: Compress images, use WebP where supported

contentGuidelines.characterNaming: Short, memorable names (WGMI Jam, WGMI 3D, WGMI Podcast)
contentGuidelines.descriptions: Brief, playful copy with crypto/web3 terminology

accessibilityConsiderations.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA standards
accessibilityConsiderations.altText: Descriptive alt text for character images
accessibilityConsiderations.focusStates: Clear focus indicators for keyboard navigation
accessibilityConsiderations.colorBlindness: Don't rely solely on color for information

aiReplicationPrompts.general: Create a modern web3/NFT landing page with playful 3D character cards featuring cute anthropomorphized objects. Use vibrant gradient backgrounds, clean bold typography, and a modular stacked design where characters sit on branded pedestals. Include dot grid patterns on light and dark sections.
aiReplicationPrompts.characterStyle: Design 3D rendered characters with large cartoon eyes, friendly expressions, and a chibi aesthetic. Characters should be recognizable objects (cameras, robots, food items) with personality. Place each on a glossy dark pedestal with brand text.
aiReplicationPrompts.colorScheme: Use high-contrast sections alternating between light (dot grid) and dark backgrounds. Apply vibrant gradients (coral, purple, neon green, cyan) to card backgrounds. Keep character bases in white/light tones on dark glossy platforms.
aiReplicationPrompts.layout: Create a hero section with centered bold heading and asymmetrically floating character cards. Below, add a dark section with 3-column card grid. Use generous spacing and modern rounded corners (16-24px) throughout.
